mean_en: a solid substance that conducts electricity in particular conditions, better than insulators but not as well as conductors; a device containing a semiconductor used in electronics
sentence: Semiconductor devices are used in electronic circuits.
sentence_trans: 半导体设备用于电子回路中。
word_etyma: semi半 ＋ con共同 ＋ duct引导 ＋ or名词后缀，表物 → semiconductor半导体
